data.title: Inside Ollie Watkins' family life with WAG Ellie and kids
data.meta_description: Ollie Watkins was an integral player in England's Euros win over the Netherlands, spurred on from the stands by his girlfriend Ellie Alderson.
data.text:
Ollie Watkins was an integral player in England's Euros 2024 appearance.

The 28-year-old scored a last-minute goal in their game against the Netherlands, bringing his team to a 2-1 advantage (the other goal scored by one Harry Kane) and sending them into their second successive European Championship final. What a feat!

Today's top videos

Not only were there tens of thousands of fans cheering England on to succeed, but Ollie's girlfriend Ellie Alderson was in the stands of Dortmund's BVB Stadion, spurring him on to succeed.

Who is Ollie's girlfriend Ellie Alderson?

Born on June 3, 1996, Ellie Anderson is a 28-year-old mum-of-two from Berkshire.

Ellie, who holds a diploma in interior design, has a twin named Sofia. She boasts an Instagram following of 28.1k.

She has been in a relationship with Ollie for six years, and the couple live together in Birmingham with their kids.

Their relationship

It's unknown how Ollie and Ellie first met as they keep details of their personal life private.

That being said, the loved-up couple frequently share snaps of themselves and their children on social media.

Their family

Ellie and Ollie welcomed their first child together, a baby girl whom they named Amara May, in September 2021.

Less than two years later, Amara became a big sister as her mum and dad welcomed a baby boy to the world. 'Our sweet boy, Marley Watkins,' Ellie wrote alongside a series of snaps of their newborn at the time.

Amara and Marley are their daddy's biggest supporters, regularly attending his Aston Villa matches with their mum.

Their engagement

Following England's Euros 2024 defeat, Ollie popped the question to his longtime love Ellie.

The couple had been enjoying a romantic holiday in Italy's Lago Di Como when the footballer went out of his way to organise a lavish all-white set-up looking out at the lake to get down on bended knee.

Sharing photos from the proposal, Ollie wrote: 'Future wifey!! It was only right. 21.07.24,' and Ellie replied: 'Love you soo much.'
